# fab-site-palette



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                                                                                                         | Type                                                                                | Default                   |
| --------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `colourValue`   | `colour-value`   | The base colour value (for dynamic generation). Default is 'var(--primary-colour)'.                                                                 | `string`                                                                            | `'var(--primary-colour)'` |
| `harmony`       | `harmony`        | The colour harmony to display. Options are 'complementary', 'analogous', 'triadic', 'tetradic', 'split', and 'neutral'. Default is 'complementary'. | `"analogous" \| "complementary" \| "neutral" \| "split" \| "tetradic" \| "triadic"` | `'complementary'`         |
| `showHarmonies` | `show-harmonies` |                                                                                                                                                     | `boolean`                                                                           | `true`                    |
